fields.name: Sales Pitch (2x, Charge 120%):
fields.value: Target a player during the evening phase. The following night, they will be asked if they would like to gain the Mortgage passive. If they accept, they will unlock/gain the passive Bad Mortgage. (But it appears to be the passive Mortgage)

fields.name: Hard Credit Check (1x, Evening, Locked):
fields.value: Unlocked when you place in the top 3. Target a player and decrease their score by 10. learn their score, standard deviation, and role.

fields.name: Default (Passive):
fields.value: When you are converted, Everyone with the Mortgage passive loses it.

fields.name: Bad Mortgage (Passive, Locked):
fields.value: The first two nights you have this passive, your score will be reduced by 7.5 percentage points. Your defense power is secretly permanently decreased by .5x.

fields.name: Loan Interest (Passive):
fields.value: You receive any score points that players who accept your Sales Pitch lose to the Mortgage passive.

fields.name: Monetary Income (Passive):
fields.value: For so long as you Include a digit or spelled out number in your response, you are immune to day effects triggered by your messages and your score is increased by 7.5 percentage points
